Use R to transform files

Source: R/forecasts-nc.R
use_rnetcdf.Rd

Workflow for transforming set of files to a single, NetCDF file using RNetCDF.

use_rnetcdf(in_files, variable = "streamflow", dstfile = NULL)

Arguments

in_files

a vector of file paths
variable

the variable to extract
dstfile

the location to store the output file

Value

a file path

Contents
